pullRequest.body:
Both lemmas are the same up to a binder swap. Also rename `zpow_eq_zero` to `eq_zero_of_zpow_ne_zero`.

Uh, what even *happened* here?
```suggestion
noncomputable instance : CompleteLinearOrder (UpperSet Î±) :=
  { UpperSet.completelyDistribLattice with
    le_total := IsTotal.total
    decidableLE := Classical.decRel _
    decidableEq := Classical.decRel _
    decidableLT := Classical.decRel _ }

noncomputable instance : CompleteLinearOrder (LowerSet Î±) :=
  { LowerSet.completelyDistribLattice with
    le_total := IsTotal.total
    decidableLE := Classical.decRel _
    decidableEq := Classical.decRel _
    decidableLT := Classical.decRel _ }
```
